name: And I saw the stars falling down...
storyline:
A woman narrates the story of how a family deals with domestic violence, and how everyone involved gives their perspective on it. But, in the end, there's nothing else we can do.

After all, this story is already over.
summary:
A woman narrates the story of how a family deals with domestic violence, and how everyone involved gives their perspective on it. But, in the end, there's nothing else we can do. After all, this story is already over.

A drama/mystery visual novel aroud 13k words, including around 13+ CGs (in black and white & full color), and a bonus content for people who decide to use accessibility tools (Turn off animations & Sound Captions)!

There's also a secret (horror?) route hidden in the game!
